note.p: Friend of Emma Cecilia (Ida) Farrer. Daughter of Charlotte Mary and Alfred Hudson Shadwell, taxing master of the Court of Chancery. Married Eliot Scarlett Currey (1836–1931), civil engineer, in 1878.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/19/47/31)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 31 October 2016)
London, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1921 (Ancestry.com, accessed 31 October 2016)
